content.en: Image transmission optimization: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the transmission of images over noisy channels. These algorithms use techniques such as source and channel coding schemes, unequal error protection strategies, and rate allocation solutions. By applying these algorithms, the researchers aim to enhance the quality and robustness of image transmission, even in challenging network conditions.
content.da: Billedtransmissionsoptimering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer til at forbedre transmissionen af billeder over støjfyldte kanaler. Disse algoritmer bruger teknikker såsom kildes- og kanalkodningsskemaer, ulige fejlbeskyttelsesstrategier og rateallokeringsløsninger. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre kvaliteten og robustheden af billedtransmission, selv under udfordrende netværksforhold.
